recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes made with simple ingredients.
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, beat the eggs, then add the milk and melted butter.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and spoon batter onto the pan, cooking until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip the pancake and cook until both sides are golden brown.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, eggs, and pancetta.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
In a separate pan, cook the pancetta until crisp.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, Parmesan cheese, and pepper.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the pan with the pancetta.
Remove the pan from heat and add the egg mixture, tossing until the spaghetti is coated.
Serve immediately, topped with additional Parmesan cheese and black pepper.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A classic Italian dish made with a meaty tomato sauce and spaghetti noodles.
instructions: In a large pan, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook until softened.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, basil, oregano, sugar, salt, and pepper.
Bring the sauce to a boil, then reduce heat to low and let simmer for 15 minutes.
While the sauce is simmering, cook the spaghetti noodles according to package instructions.
Drain the noodles and serve with the Bolognese sauce spooned on top.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken in a creamy tomato sauce.
ingredients: 1 lb boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together the chicken, yogurt, garam masala, paprika, cumin, coriander, turmeric, and cayenne pepper.
Cover the bowl and let the chicken marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
Preheat the grill to high heat and grill the chicken until cooked through.
In a large pan, saut√© the onion and garlic until softened.
Stir in the diced tomatoes and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low and let the sauce simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in the heavy cream and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and let heat through.
Serve over rice or with naan bread.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy chicken stir fry with vegetables and a flavorful sauce.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breast, sliced into thin strips
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, cornstarch, water, hoisin sauce, and sesame oil.
Heat the oil in a large wok or frying pan over high heat.
Add the chicken and cook for 3-4 minutes, until browned.
Add the onion, garlic, carrots, bell peppers, and snow peas and stir fry for 2-3 minutes.
Pour in the sauce and continue to stir fry for another minute, until the sauce has thickened and the vegetables are tender.
Serve the chicken stir fry over steamed rice.

recipes.name: Veggie Stir Fry
recipes.description: A colorful and flavorful stir fry with your choice of vegetables.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the garlic and onion, and stir fry for 30 seconds.
Add the bell pepper, yellow squash, zucchini, and mushrooms, and stir fry for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in the ginger, soy sauce, cornstarch, and water.
Stir fry until the vegetables are just tender and the sauce has thickened.

recipes.name: Spicy Vegan Tacos
recipes.description: Spicy and flavorful tacos filled with lentils and sweet potatoes.
instructions: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Add the onion and bell pepper, and cook until softened.
Stir in the chili powder, cumin, and paprika, and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the lentils and broth, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-25 minutes.
Stir in the sweet potato, and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
Mash the avocado with the lime juice, and spread on the tortillas.
Spoon the lentil mixture onto the tortillas, and sprinkle with cilantro.
